_description: A scribe’s excuse for poor writing: ‘if my pene had bine beter’ — two couplets

PierpontAcc698.Transcription:
Thomas Albone is my namewith hande and pene I write the sameand
                    if my pene had bene beterthen I woulde haue mended my letter
PierpontAcc698.Note:
Added to left margin by a sixteenth-century hand in the Morgan copy of
                        
            Caxton, William, trans., Somme des vices et vertus [English] The Ryal Book,
            [Westminster: William Caxton, about 1486] .
